There is a built-in dataset in R called `cars`. 

You can read the description of the dataset by running 

```{r}
?cars
```

Explore the dataset. Answer the following questions:

a. What does the dataset describe?

b. How many observations are there?

c. How many variables/columns are there?

d. What relationship do you observe between the two variables?
